name: Treasure Hunt (Xu Jia)
description:
Brief 1

Treasure Hunt is an episodic exploration game.

The plot is set in ancient China and the protagonist needs to explore the available items and talk to NPCs in various cities to touch the plot. The game showcases ancient Chinese architecture and ancient Chinese character items.

Every warrior fights for justice, kills for justice, and the ultimate goal is just to end the battle with a fight, so there is no absolute justice or evil, or even no essential difference between the two.

If you fight the dragon too long, you will become an evil dragon; if you stare at the abyss too long, the abyss will stare back.

How to play

•Control the direction of the character with WASD

•Mouse to control the view

•A thumbnail map is available in the top right corner of the screen

Easy to find mission points quickly

•Automated route-finding function
